modifications: Added multiple slash-related interfaces and types
Created sections for Slash Mechanics, Slash Events

patterns_discovered: Comprehensive type system for game mechanics
Detailed configuration interfaces for game subsystems
Separation of state, config, and event interfaces
gotchas_discovered: Complex type definitions might increase compile-time overhead
Many nested interfaces could make state management more complex
High granularity of configuration might introduce performance considerations

approach_outcome.description: Added slash energy, power, and pattern types

recommendations: Consider creating a type generator or code generation strategy
Add comprehensive documentation for these new types
Create unit tests to validate the type system's integrity
Review performance implications of the detailed type definitions
